title: Topic 001 Question 098
body: You have been tasked with implementing external web application protection against common web application attacks for a public application on Google Cloud.
You want to validate these policy changes before they are enforced. What service should you use?
options: Google Cloud Armor's preconfigured rules in preview mode
Prepopulated VPC firewall rules in monitor mode
The inherent protections of Google Front End (GFE)
VPC Service Controls in dry run mode
